vulnerability.name: USN-3993-2
vulnerability.description: USN-3993-1 fixed a vulnerability in curl. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 12.04 ESM and Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   It was discovered that curl incorrectly handled memory when receiving data  from a TFTP server. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause curl to  crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary  code. (CVE-2019-5436)

statements.status_notes: curl could be made to crash if it received a specially crafted data. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
